Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays following an earlier door problem at Racine. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays following an earlier door problem at Racine.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
